content.question: The early Christian church Santa Sabina was modeled on the general plan of an ancient Roman basilica in part because the

choices.label: domed entryway invited a comparison with the mysteries of the heavens
vaulted low ceiling created an intimate space that encouraged private worship
classical friezes emphasized the importance of the building to the congregation
clerestory windows admitted glowing light that served a practical and spiritual function

content.answer: clerestory windows admitted glowing light that served a practical and spiritual function
